comments.text:
Comment on attachment 547060
Adding files and modifying functions.inc.php

I don't know why 'svn diff' doesn't show file additions. FWIW, I svn-copied over geoip directory from mozilla-europe.org/includes/ to /includes/.

It shows in `svn st` though.

comments.raw_text:
Review of attachment 547060:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Can you replace all $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] with $config['file_root'] ? Also use longer variable names than $l and $gi please.

Otherwise, looks good.
